carousel-data.text: "SCoop-ers" gather for a photo outside of LEAFHouse after installing a living canopy at the 2019 SCoop Spring Bash
SCoop members support the green new deal and climate justice during the Climate Justice Rally at UMD.
SCoop partners with the We Are Water collective to clean up Paint Branch stream in April of 2019.

activities.title: Cleanups
activities.text: Sometimes partnering with We Are Water Collective and sometimes setting up our own hikes, we regularly host opportunities to explore and clean up nature with our fellow SCoop-ers!

activities.title: Workshops
activities.text: At our biweekly meetings, we offer the opportunity for any individual or organization to submit proposals for collaborative workshops focused on specific projects. Submit your workshop proposal here and join us at our meetings in the ESJ loft to participate in others!

activities.title: Networking
activities.text: SCoop meetings and events give members a chance to meet other individuals and organizations in the local  sustainability community and find opportunities for jobs and involvement in projects.

membership.title: Exit
membership.text: Please proceed to the nearest exit portal
